TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParallelLoopState extends System.Object

summary.span: 可使并行循环迭代与其他迭代交互。

span.span: Enables iterations of parallel loops to interact with other iterations.

summary.span: 此类的实例由 类提供给每个循环；不能在你的用户代码中创建实例。

span.span: An instance of this class is provided by the class to each loop; you can not create instances in your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，不能实例化此类的实例。Note that you cannot instantiate an instance of this class. 它在或方法调用中由编译器自动生成为参数 。It is automatically generated by the compiler as an argument in a call to the or method. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. C # 中的构造（如 `for` 和 `foreach` (） ) 和 `For` 中的 `For Each` (Visual Basic) 按顺序从最低索引到最高的索引执行，或从集合中的第一个对象到最后一个对象。Constructs such as `for` and `foreach` (in C#) and `For` and `For Each` (in Visual Basic) execute sequentially from the lowest index to the highest or from the first object in a set to the last. 相反， 和 方法不会。In contrast, the and methods do not. 由于循环的单个迭代是并行运行的，因此它们可以按任意顺序开始和结束。Because individual iterations of the loop run in parallel, they can begin and end in any order. 类允许并行循环的各个迭代彼此交互。The class allows individual iterations of parallel loops to interact with one another. 通过类，可以执行以下操作：The class allows you to: - 退出当前迭代，并通过调用方法防止任何其他迭代开始 。Exit the current iteration and prevent any additional iterations from starting by calling the method. 这不会影响已开始执行的迭代。This does not affect iterations that have already begun execution. - 通过调用方法，阻止索引大于当前索引的任何迭代执行 。Prevent any iterations with an index greater than the current index from executing by calling the method. 这不会影响已开始执行的迭代。This does not affect iterations that have already begun execution. - 通过检索属性的值来确定是否已在任何循环迭代中发生了异常 。Determine whether an exception has occurred in any loop iteration by retrieving the value of the property. - 通过检索属性的值来确定循环的任何迭代是否已调用 方法 。Determine whether any iteration of the loop has called the method by retrieving the value of the property. 您可以使用此属性从在调用方法之前启动但仍在执行的循环迭代中返回 。You can use this property to return from iterations of the loop that started before the call to the method but are still executing. - 通过检索属性的值，确定循环的任何迭代是否已调用 或 方法或引发了异常 。Determine whether any iteration of the loop has called the or method or has thrown an exception by retrieving the value of the property. - 退出长时间运行的迭代，该迭代的索引大于通过检索属性的值而调用 Break 的迭代的索引 。Exit from a long-running iteration whose index is greater than the index of an iteration in which Break was called by retrieving the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的示例并行执行最多100迭代的循环。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 每个迭代都将暂停1到1000毫秒的随机间隔。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定调用方法的循环迭代 。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如示例的输出所示，在调用方法后，索引大于属性值的任何迭代都不会 开始 。As the output from the example shows, no iterations whose index is greater than the property value start after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 由于调用方法时循环的迭代仍可能会执行，因此 每次迭代都会调用 属性来检查其他迭代是否已调用 方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the property to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果属性值为 `true` ，则迭代会检查属性的值， 如果该值大于当前迭代的索引值，则会立即返回。If the property value is `true`, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately.

threadsafe.span: 实例仅在为其提供实例的循环主体中使用。

span.span: A instance is meant to be used only within the body of the loop to which an instance was provided.

threadsafe.span: 在关联的循环结束后使用提供的实例是不安全的 ，也不安全地将其显式传递给其他线程，并使这些线程随时访问。

span.span: It is not safe to use a provided instance after the associated loop ends, nor is it safe to explicitly hand it off to other threads and have those threads access it at any time.

threadsafe.span: 将为 循环中涉及的每个线程提供不同的实例。

span.span: A different instance will be provided to each thread involved in a loop.
Data Parallelism (Task Parallel Library)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Break() cil managed

summary.span: 告知 循环应在系统方便的时候尽早停止执行当前迭代之外的迭代。

span.span: Communicates that the loop should cease execution of iterations beyond the current iteration at the system's earliest convenience.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示应运行当前迭代之后的任何迭代。 indicates that no iterations after the current iteration should be run. 它可以有效地取消循环的任何其他迭代。It effectively cancels any additional iterations of the loop. 但是，它不会停止已经开始执行的任何迭代。However, it does not stop any iterations that have already begun execution. 例如，如果 是从从0到1000的并行循环的第100迭代调用的，则所有小于100的迭代仍应运行，但不会执行从101到1000的迭代。For example, if is called from the 100th iteration of a parallel loop iterating from 0 to 1,000, all iterations less than 100 should still be run, but the iterations from 101 through to 1000 that have not yet started are not executed. 对于可能已在执行的长时间运行的迭代， 如果当前索引小于的当前值，则将属性设置为当前迭代的索引 。For long-running iterations that may already be executing, sets the property to the current iteration's index if the current index is less than the current value of . 若要停止其索引大于从争用执行的最低中断迭代的迭代，应执行以下操作：To stop iterations whose index is greater than the lowest break iteration from competing execution, you should do the following: 1. 检查属性是否 为 `true` 。Check whether the property is `true`. 2. 如果其索引大于属性值，则从迭代退出 。Exit from the iteration if its index is greater than the property value. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. 通常在基于搜索的算法中采用，其中排序在数据源中存在。 is typically employed in search-based algorithms where an ordering is present in the data source. ## Examples 下面的示例并行执行最多100迭代的循环。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 每个迭代都将暂停1到1000毫秒的随机间隔。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定调用方法的循环迭代 。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如示例的输出所示，在调用方法后，索引大于属性值的任何迭代都不会 开始 。As the output from the example shows, no iterations whose index is greater than the property value start after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 由于调用方法时循环的迭代仍可能会执行，因此 每次迭代都会调用 属性来检查其他迭代是否已调用 方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the property to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果属性值为 `true` ，则迭代会检查属性的值， 如果该值大于当前迭代的索引值，则会立即返回。If the property value is `true`, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately.

span.span: The method was previously called.

exception.span: 和 不能被相同循环的迭代组合使用。

span.span: and may not be used in combination by iterations of the same loop.
Data Parallelism (Task Parallel Library)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsExceptional As Boolean
public: property bool IsExceptional { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取循环的任何迭代是否已引发相应迭代未处理的异常。

span.span: Gets whether any iteration of the loop has thrown an exception that went unhandled by that iteration.

value.span: 如果引发了未经处理的异常，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if an unhandled exception was thrown; otherwise, .
Data Parallelism (Task Parallel Library)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsStopped As Boolean
public: property bool IsStopped { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取循环的任何迭代是否已调用 方法。

span.span: Gets whether any iteration of the loop has called the method.

value.span: 如果任何迭代通过调用 方法已停止循环，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if any iteration has stopped the loop by calling the method; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于循环的长时间运行迭代，您可以检索属性的值， 以确定在调用方法之前开始执行的循环的任何迭代是否 仍在执行。For long-running iterations of the loop, you can retrieve the value of the property to determine whether any iterations of the loop that began execution before the call to the method are still executing. 然后，可以使用属性的值 来确定是否应立即返回或正常执行。You can then use the value of the property to determine whether they should return immediately or execute normally. ## Examples 下面的示例并行执行最多10000迭代的循环。The following example executes up to 10,000 iterations of a loop in parallel. 每个迭代都将暂停1到1000毫秒的随机间隔。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定调用方法的循环迭代 。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 由于调用方法时循环的迭代仍可能会执行，因此 lambda 表达式会调用 方法来检查其他迭代是否已调用 方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, the lambda expression calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果它返回 `true` ，则迭代立即返回。If it returns `true`, the iteration returns immediately. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/stop1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/stop1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LowestBreakIteration As Nullable(Of Long)
public: property Nullable<long> LowestBreakIteration { Nullable<long> get(); };

summary.span: 获取从中调用 的最低循环迭代。

span.span: Gets the lowest iteration of the loop from which was called.

value.span: 从中调用 的最低迭代。

span.span: The lowest iteration from which was called.

value.span: 如果是 循环，该值会基于内部生成的索引。

span.span: In the case of a loop, the value is based on an internally-generated index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并行循环的多个迭代可以调用 方法。It is possible for multiple iterations of a parallel loop to call the method. 如果是这样，则此值是调用的迭代的最小索引 。If they do, this value is the smallest index of an iteration that called . 如果没有调用循环的迭代 ，此属性将返回 `null` 。If no iteration of the loop called , this property returns `null`. 请注意，对方法的调用不会影响属性值 。Note that the property value is unaffected by calls to the method. 在长时间运行的迭代中，如果调用方法的迭代之后的所有迭代都 不需要运行，则 使用属性来终止在调用方法之前开始执行的迭代 。In long-running iterations in which all iterations after the iteration that calls the method need not run, the property is used to terminate iterations that began execution before the call to the method. 若要停止其索引大于从争用执行的最低中断迭代的迭代，应执行以下操作：To stop iterations whose index is greater than the lowest break iteration from competing execution, you should do the following: 1. 检查属性是否 为 `true` 。Check whether the property is `true`. 2. 如果其索引大于属性值，则从迭代退出 。Exit from the iteration if its index is greater than the property value. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下面的示例并行执行最多100迭代的循环。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 每个迭代都将暂停1到1000毫秒的随机间隔。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定调用方法的循环迭代 。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 这会阻止其索引大于 属性值的迭代在调用方法后开始 ，但它不会影响已开始执行的任何迭代。This prevents iterations whose index is greater than the property value from starting after the call to the method, but it does not affect any iterations that have already begun executing. 若要防止这些工作完成，每次迭代都会调用 方法来检查其他迭代是否已调用 方法。To prevent these from completing, each iteration calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果是这样，则迭代检查属性的值， 如果该值大于当前迭代的索引值，则立即返回。If so, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 请注意，由于 值超出并行循环的范围，因此，如果要保留其值，则必须将其分配给在循环外部可见的变量。Note that, because the value is out of scope outside of the parallel loop, you must assign it to a variable that is visible outside of the loop if you want to preserve its value.

span.span: Data Parallelism (Task Parallel Library)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ShouldExitCurrentIteration As Boolean
public: property bool ShouldExitCurrentIteration { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取循环的当前迭代是否应基于此迭代或其他迭代发出的请求退出。

span.span: Gets whether the current iteration of the loop should exit based on requests made by this or other iterations.

value.span: 如果当前迭代应退出，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current iteration should exit; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 下列任一情况下，属性将设置为 `true` ：The property is set to `true` under any of the following conditions: - 循环的迭代调用 或 。An iteration of the loop calls or . - 循环迭代引发异常。An iteration of the loop throws an exception. - 循环已取消。The loop is canceled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 类将主动尝试禁止从开始执行循环的其他迭代。When this property is `true`, the class will proactively attempt to prohibit additional iterations of the loop from starting execution. 但是，在某些情况下，它无法阻止启动其他迭代。However, there may be cases where it is unable to prevent additional iterations from starting. 这也可能是长时间运行的迭代已开始执行。It may also be the case that a long-running iteration has already begun execution. 在这种情况下，如果属性返回，则迭代可能会显式检查 属性并停止执行 `true` 。In such cases, iterations may explicitly check the property and cease execution if the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例并行执行最多100迭代的循环。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 每个迭代都将暂停1到1000毫秒的随机间隔。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定调用方法的循环迭代 。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 这会阻止其索引大于 属性值的迭代在调用方法后开始 ，但它不会影响已开始执行的任何迭代。This prevents iterations whose index is greater than the property value from starting after the call to the method, but it does not affect any iterations that have already begun executing. 若要防止这些工作完成，每次迭代都会调用 方法来检查其他迭代是否已调用 方法。To prevent these from completing, each iteration calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果是这样，则迭代检查属性的值， 如果该值大于当前迭代的索引值，则立即返回。If so, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)]

span.span: Data Parallelism (Task Parallel Library)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 告知 循环应在系统方便的时候尽早停止执行。

span.span: Communicates that the loop should cease execution at the system's earliest convenience.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法指示尚未开始的循环的任何迭代都无需运行。Calling the method indicates that any iterations of the loop that have not yet started need not be run. 它可以有效地取消循环的任何其他迭代。It effectively cancels any additional iterations of the loop. 但是，它不会停止已经开始执行的任何迭代。However, it does not stop any iterations that have already begun execution. 调用 方法会导致此 属性返回到 `true` 仍在执行的循环的任何迭代。Calling the method causes the property to return `true` for any iteration of the loop that is still executing. 这对于长时间运行的迭代特别有用，它可以检查 属性并在其值为时提前退出 `true` 。This is particularly useful for long-running iterations, which can check the property and exit early if its value is `true`. 通常在基于搜索的算法中使用，在找到结果后，不需要执行其他迭代。 is typically employed in search-based algorithms, where once a result is found, no other iterations need be executed. ## Examples 下面的示例并行执行最多10000迭代的循环。The following example executes up to 10,000 iterations of a loop in parallel. 每个迭代都将暂停1到1000毫秒的随机间隔。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定调用方法的循环迭代 。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如示例的输出所示，在调用方法后不会执行任何迭代 。As the output from the example shows, no iterations execute after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/stop1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/stop1.vb#1)] 由于调用方法时循环的迭代仍可能会执行，因此 ，每次迭代都会调用 方法来检查其他迭代是否已调用 方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the method to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果它返回 `true` ，则迭代立即返回。If it returns `true`, the iteration returns immediately.

span.span: The method was called previously.

exception.span: 和 不能被相同循环的迭代组合使用。

span.span: and may not be used in combination by iterations of the same loop.
Data Parallelism (Task Parallel Library)
